name: Political Science
descriptions: The Political Science minor provides a foundation in American government, political theory, comparative politics, and international relations. All courses must be passed with a grade of C- or higher.
No more than 3 hours at the 10000 level, no more than 10 hours below the 30000 level, and no more than 6 hours of internship credit may be counted.

courses: One of: POSC 20093 - Scope & Methods of Political Science or POSC 20203 - Introduction to Political Theory - 3 hrs.

electiveCourses.description: 15 additional hours of political science courses. Max 3 hours at 10000 level, max 10 hours below 30000 level, max 6 hours of internship credit.
